trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un controllo che può essere trascinato dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control can be included in another control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, to let the user change the control's value.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo Thumb può essere incluso in un altro controllo, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo, per consentire all'utente di modificare il valore del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The Thumb can also be used to resize controls.
trans-unit.target: La casella di scorrimento consente anche di ridimensionare i controlli.

trans-unit.source: For example, a Thumb control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un controllo casella di scorrimento nell'angolo di una finestra è possibile fornire un percorso per l'utente di fare clic con il mouse per avviare un'operazione di ridimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Thumb provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce Thumb <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>associate con il puntatore del mouse di operazioni di trascinamento di eventi da gestire.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the left mouse button, the Thumb control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente preme il pulsante sinistro del mouse, il controllo Thumb riceve lo stato attivo logico e il mouse capture e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: While the Thumb control has focus and mouse capture, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event can be raised multiple times without limit.
trans-unit.target: Mentre il controllo Thumb dispone dello stato attivo e mouse capture, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento può essere generato più volte senza limiti.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the left mouse button, the Thumb control loses mouse capture and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente rilascia il pulsante sinistro del mouse, il controllo Thumb perde il mouse capture e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the Thumb.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni sull'evento fornisce una modifica della posizione, ma non viene riposizionata la casella di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: You must manually change or reposition the Thumb or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Manualmente, è necessario modificare o riposizionare il cursore o qualsiasi altro elemento che si desidera modificare le dimensioni o come risultato dell'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: The Thumb control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo Thumb non fornisce funzionalità di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: A Thumb control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo Thumb può ricevere il mouse capture, ma non può ricevere lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>che corrisponde allo stato attivo è impostata su `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the parent class <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that sets this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore esegue l'override della classe padre <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>che imposta questa proprietà su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> events.
trans-unit.target: Per fornire funzionalità di trascinamento, viene fornita la gestione di classi per la <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>e <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseMove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a Thumb is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the Thumb reflects the size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando un controllo Thumb fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controllo che scorre il contenuto in un'area visualizzabile o viewport, la dimensione del cursore riflette la dimensione del viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control that is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: La figura seguente mostra un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controllo che fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## Customizing the Thumb Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Thumb controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![Illustrazione di ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "illustrazione di Scrollbar") # # personalizzazione il controllo Thumb per applicare le stesse impostazioni di proprietà a più controlli Thumb, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>per fornire al controllo un aspetto univoco.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla creazione di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, vedere [personalizzazione dell'aspetto di un controllo esistente tramite la creazione di ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Thumb, see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare le parti e stati specifici di cursore, vedere [Thumb stili e modelli di](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà di dipendenza per questo controllo potrebbe essere impostata dallo stile predefinito del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se una proprietà viene impostata da uno stile predefinito, la proprietà può variare rispetto al valore predefinito quando il controllo viene visualizzato nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Lo stile predefinito è determinato dal tema del desktop viene utilizzato quando l'applicazione è in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [temi WPF predefiniti](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Impostando una proprietà visiva può avere effetto solo se la proprietà è sia presente nel modello predefinito del controllo pulsante che viene impostata tramite una.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: È possibile trovare un elenco di proprietà visive nella sezione "Modifica la struttura Visual di un controllo" [personalizzazione dell'aspetto di un controllo esistente tramite la creazione di ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Cancels a drag operation for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Annulla un'operazione di trascinamento per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>presenta mouse capture e lo stato attivo logico, questo metodo rimuove il mouse capture e genera un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo perde lo stato mouse capture.

trans-unit.source: This DragCompleted event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento DragCompleted si verifica quando viene rilasciato il pulsante sinistro del mouse o la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo riceve lo stato mouse capture quando l'utente preme il pulsante sinistro del mouse posizionando il puntatore del mouse sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse when the DragCompleted event occurs is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs> of the last <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event.
trans-unit.target: La posizione del mouse quando si verifica l'evento DragCompleted viene fornita per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>dell'ultimo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Bubbling | | Delegato | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"> </xref> dell'evento indirizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica uno o più volte quando il mouse cambia posizione quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo ha lo stato attivo logico e mouse capture.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo riceve lo stato attivo e mouse capture quando l'utente preme il pulsante sinistro del mouse posizionando il puntatore del mouse sul <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo perde lo stato mouse capture quando l'utente rilascia il pulsante sinistro del mouse o quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: A new DragDelta event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo evento DragDelta si verifica ogni volta che si sposta la posizione del mouse sullo schermo.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, questo evento può generare più volte senza un limite quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo ha lo stato mouse capture.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Bubbling | | Delegato | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"> </xref> dell'evento indirizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control receives logical focus and mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo riceve lo stato attivo logico e il mouse capture.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo riceve lo stato attivo e mouse capture quando l'utente preme il pulsante sinistro del mouse posizionando il puntatore del mouse su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni sugli eventi indirizzati di | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Strategia di routing | Bubbling | | Delegato | |

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"> </xref> dell'evento indirizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo ha lo stato attivo logico e mouse capture e viene premuto il pulsante sinistro del mouse.

trans-unit.source: When the IsDragging property changes its value, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando la proprietà IsDragging cambia il relativo valore, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.OnDraggingChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: A partire da .NET Framework versione 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsDragging è un metodo di impostazione protetto.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Per usare questa funzionalità, l'applicazione deve essere destinata a .NET Framework versione 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [versioni e dipendenze](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo ha lo stato attivo e mouse capture; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ThumbAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*> property.
trans-unit.target: Risponde a una modifica nel valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe di gestione di <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventi impostando <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>a `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method gives the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, questo metodo offre il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>lo stato attivo logico e il mouse capture e imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione genera anche il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe di gestione di <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>eventi impostando <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>a `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: Also, this method removes mouse capture from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, questo metodo rimuove il mouse capture dal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>e imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.IsDragging%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: This implementation also raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione genera anche il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe di gestione di <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> event when the mouse moves.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>presenta lo stato attivo logico e mouse capture, questa implementazione genera il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta>evento quando il mouse viene spostato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event is handled by setting <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: In questo scenario, il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>evento viene gestito mediante l'impostazione <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento.
